sense.def:
To draw a picture, pattern, or diagram
pomeni izdelati risbo, vzorec ali diagram s svinčnikom, peresom, barvnikom ali pastelom.

seg.quote: She used to draw funny pictures.

sense.def:
Kadar vozila ali osebe
draw away
ali
draw near
, se odmaknejo proč ali primaknejo bliže.

seg.quote: The cab drew away from the kerb.

sense.def:
To draw someone or something in a particular direction
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj potegniti v določeno smer.

seg.quote: He draws the document from its folder.

sense.def:
Kadar žival
draws a cart or other vehicle
, se premika tako, da za seboj vleče voz ali kakšno drugo vozilo.

To draw a curtain or blind
pomeni potegniti zaveso ali oknico čez okno, da ga zastremo ali odstremo.

Kadar neki dogodek ali obdobje
draws to an end
ali
draws to a close
, se končuje.

Če nekdo
draws a gun, sword, or knife
, potegne pištolo, meč ali nož iz toka, da je pripravljen za uporabo.

To draw a deep breath
pomeni globoko vdihniti.

To draw money out of a bank or building society
pomeni vzeti denar iz banke ali stavbnega podjetja, da ga lahko uporabimo.

Če je nekaj
drawn from a thing or place
, tisto dobimo iz neke stvari ali s kraja.

seg.quote: The committee members are drawn from all sections of the local community.

sense.def:
To draw a conclusion, distinction, or comparison
pomeni ugotoviti, da nekaj obstaja ali je resnično.

seg.quote: Unfortunately, they drew the wrong conclusions.

sense.def:
Če nekaj, kar storimo,
draws a particular reaction
, se ljudje na tisto odzovejo na določen način.

seg.quote: The mayor drew criticism for these excesses.

sense.def:
To draw people's attention to something
pomeni poskrbeti, da ljudje postanejo pozorni na nekaj.

seg.quote: He drew attention to the rising unemployment rates.

sense.def:
Če oseba ali skupina na tekmovanju
draws with another one
, imata enako število točk in nobena ne zmaga.

seg.quote: The fifth game ended in a draw.

sense.def:
To draw someone into something
pomeni povzročiti, da se nekdo v nekaj zaplete.

seg.quote: She refused to be drawn into the conversation.

sense.def:
To draw on something
ali
to draw upon something
pomeni nekaj uporabljati.

seg.quote: ...the kind of information an expert draws on.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
draws on a cigarette
, vdihava zrak skozi cigareto v pljuča.

To draw up a document, list, or plan
pomeni pripraviti in napisati listino, seznam ali načrt.

seg.quote: I was busy drawing up plans for the new course.

sense.def:
Kadar vozilo
draws up
, pripelje do nekega kraja in se ustavi.
